title: The 2025 Meme Rewind: The 12 Viral Moments That Defined the Year
excerpt: The definitive ranking of 2025's best memes. From the '6-7' trend and Steve the Fish to the Coldplay Kiss Cam, explore the 12 viral moments that broke the internet this year.
author: Ruthvik Reddy

title: Rumor: Half Life 3 with the 2026 Steam Machine Launch?
excerpt: Reports indicate Valve aims to bundle the long-awaited sequel, possibly titled Half-Life: Xen, with a next-gen console in 2026. However, since volatile RAM prices are driving up manufacturing costs, which could delay the hardware and the game.
